miniapp.name: FlashCalc
miniapp.subtitle: A tiny, fast calculator in one tap.
miniapp.description: FlashCalc is a minimal tap-first calculator with a clean history of your last results, built to live inside Farcaster Mini Apps.
miniapp.tagline: A tiny, fast calculator in one tap.
miniapp.ogDescription: FlashCalc is a minimal tap-first calculator with a clean history of your last results, built to live inside Farcaster Mini Apps.
